rows.label: qst104230_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to the Smaia Clinic.
Ah, it's you lot again!

rows.label: qst104230_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm afraid Doctor Smaia isn't
in the clinic right now. Again.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0008
rows.name:
Was there something urgent
you wanted her for?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0009
rows.name:
You want to recruit Doctor Smaia
to teach in a school?!

rows.label: qst104230_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, I suppose you would
definitely have to discuss that
with her in person.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0101
rows.name:
I'm not sure if Doctor Smaia will be
interested in teaching children...

rows.label: qst104230_msg0102
rows.name:
After all, she even treats me as
more of an odd-jobs man than
an actual apprentice...

rows.label: qst104230_msg0201
rows.name:
Doctor Smaia accepted your invitation
to a teaching post?!

rows.label: qst104230_msg0202
rows.name:
I can hardly believe it...
Doctor Smaia? Teaching children?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0203
rows.name:
I wonder what will happen
to this clinic...

rows.label: qst104230_msg0204
rows.name:
I'll have to discuss it with her
when she comes back. Maybe
this could be my big opportunity?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0301
rows.name: Have Smaia come as a teacher?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0302
rows.name: Hire her

rows.label: qst104230_msg0303
rows.name: Think it over

rows.label: qst104230_msg0006
rows.name:
This time she's on a trip to
Iyasaki Village in Liberalitas.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0007
rows.name:
Apparently there's some kind of
medicinal plant she's looking for in
a place called Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0401
rows.name:
But I don't know where that place is,
so you all would have to help look...

rows.label: qst104230_msg0402
rows.name:
After that...
Well, if you're lucky, she might
fulfill your request.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0501
rows.name:
I don't know if Doctor Smaia will
accept the post or not.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0502
rows.name:
Perhaps it would just turn out to be a
fool's errand. Yes, it'd be wise to think
it over before going to the trouble.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0601
rows.name:
I'll be sure to let Doctor Smaia know
that you asked after her when she
returns.
